Performer:
Yoshida Bunshi (see also Yoshida Wakatama) (吉田文司)

Alternate Name: Yoshida Wakatama (吉田若玉)

Dates: '1990/04-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Puppeteer:

July 1990: The Bloodshed at Ise

August 1990: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

September 1990: The Adachi Plain in Oshu

November 1990: The Pregnant Mountain Ogress (Heroine)

December 1990: The Trouble in the Date Household

February 1991: The Vendetta in Iga

April 1991: The New Usuyuki Story

May 1991: The New Usuyuki Story

July 1991: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

August 1991: Mt. Oeyama

September 1991: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

November 1991: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

January 1992: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

April 1992: The Vendetta in Iga

May 1992: The Story of Priest Roben

July 1992: The Red-Hot Love of the Greengrocer's Daughter

August 1992: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil

November 1992: The Love Suicides at Amijima

January 1993: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons

February 1993: The Courier for Hell

April 1993: The Tycoon's Exploit

May 1993: The Tycoon's Exploit

August 1993: The Summer Festival at Naniwa

September 1993: The Priest Karukaya and the Souvenir of Tsukushi

November 1993: The Loyal Samurai

January 1994: The Battle of Sakamoto Castle

February 1994: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

April 1994: The Teachings for Women

September 1994: The White Fox of Shinoda

November 1994: The League of the 47 Ronin

December 1994 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

January 1995: The Nine-Tailed Fox

February 1995: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

April 1995: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

May 1995: The Gion Festival

January 1996: The Seven Gods of Fortune

August 1995: The Story of Manda Ponds

September 1995: The Murder in Revenge

April 1996: The White Fox of Shinoda

July 1996: Sasayaki no take

July 1996: The Courier for Hell

September 1996: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

February 1997: The Love Suicide of Tokubei and Ofusa

February 1997: The Twins and the Sumida River

September 1997: The Stone Monument of Glory

January 1998: Fishing for Wives

April 1998: The New Usuyuki Story

May 1998: The Vendetta in Iga

July 2000: Urikohime and Amanjaku

December 2000: The Vow of Rokusuke

April 2001: The Crossroads of Gappo

February 1996: The Battle of Kawanakajima

January 2002: The Eternal Love of Onatsu and Seijurō

July/August 2002: The Tongue-Cut Sparrow

April 2002: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

March 1996 Tour: The Cherry Trees Along the Hidaka River
